review: I got the fire TV stick as a gift and I(we) really love it.  Have used it to watch Prime Movies, You tube videos and also  Picture albums I uploaded.It's much better than my old Roku.  Am surprised by how much we have used it since receiving it.

review: This thing is constantly buffering.  I got it for a song on the Black Friday deals, it really does not work well. Despite the updates, resets, unpluggings, etc.  can't figure it out, not just the Amazon content, Netflix too.  My roku and xboxone, much better.  You'd think with the millions sold they'd have mastered how to stream with a supposed 100mb Comcast xfinity internet pipe.  Guess not.

review: It's great when it works.  However, it has a lot of trouble connecting.  It's not my Internet.  I have a smart tv and it connects fine when the fire stick has lost connection.  I would rather use this for Amazon prime because the menu is more user friendly than my smart tv.
